verbose_text: The formula decreased the incidence of side effects elicited by irinotecan, 5-fluorouracil or leucovorin in colon carcinoma patients and capecitabine in hepatocellular carcinoma patients [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: elicited by irinotecan, 5-fluorouracil or leucovorin in colon carcinoma patients and capecitabine
